Blacknightmare::

She leaded Orchesta for several tunnels and soon they arrived to 
Darkfate's base.

"There is..." said the reaven while she walked towards the base,, the 
base's door opened and she leaded orchesta to Darkfate's 
quarters "You'll speak with him soon..."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> OOC: No, the 3 musical brothers don't have a beast mode.
> 
> IC:  Orchestra smiled.
> 
>         "Ah yes, meeting your leader would be a pleasure," 
Orchestra said,
> slowly following Blacknightmare.
